    • read

      public java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>> read​(java.io.BufferedReader bRdr) throws java.io.IOException
      Specified by:

      Returns:
      SortedMap where keys are query/topic IDs and values are title portions of the topics

    • generateQueryString

      public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> generateQueryString​(org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader reader, java.lang.String docid, boolean paragraph, int k, boolean isWeighted, SearchCollection.QueryConstructor qc, org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer analyzer) throws java.io.IOException
      For TREC2018 News Track Background linking task, the query string is actually a document id. In order to make sense of the query we extract the top terms with higher tf-idf scores from the raw document of that docId from the index.
      Parameters:
      reader - index reader
      docid - the query docid
      paragraph - paragraph
      k - how many terms will be picked from the query document
      isWeighted - whether to include terms' tf-idf score as their weights
      qc - Query Constructor
      analyzer - Analyzer
      Returns:
      Strings constructed query strings
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - any IO exception

    • convertDocidToLuceneDocid

      public static int convertDocidToLuceneDocid​(org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader reader, java.lang.String docid) throws java.io.IOException
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
